description:
Colgate 360 Whole Mouth Clean Toothbrush is made with medium bristles and reduces 151% more bacteria*.

Colgate 360 Whole Mouth Clean Manual Toothbrush is designed to clean and care for the whole mouth and reduces 151% more bacteria*.

Colgate 360 Medium Manual toothbrush cleans more than just teeth, use it to clean:
- Teeth.
- Cheeks.
- Tongue.
- Gums.

Colgate 360 toothbrush features interdental bristles and rubber polishing cups. It also features a unique tongue and cheek cleaner on the back of the toothbrush head that gently scrubs the inner cheek and removes odour-causing bacteria from the tongue.

The manual toothbrush handle is made with 25% recycled plastic and is recyclable. Recycle toothbrush through TerraCycle.

Pack Size: Value Pack^ 2 x Medium Bristle Toothbrushes

Toothbrush Colours may vary.

Dentists & Hygienists recommend replacing your toothbrush every 3 months.

*Bacteria that cause bad breath vs brushing teeth alone with a flat trim toothbrush.
^Vs RRP of Colgate 360 Whole Mouth Clean 1 pack.


WHOLE MOUTH CLEAN: Colgate 360 Manual toothbrush with Medium Bristles is designed for a whole mouth clean

REDUCES 151% MORE BACTERIA*: Bacteria that cause bad breath vs brushing teeth alone with a flat trim toothbrush

INTERDENTAL MEDIUM BRISTLES: help clean in between teeth and along the gumline

POLISHING CUPS: gently help remove surface stains

VALUE PACK: 2 Medium Manual Toothbrushes. Colours may vary
name: Colgate 360 Whole Mouth Clean Medium Toothbrush Value Pack 2 Pack
